sense.gloss: to be petrified, to be unable to move, to be paralyzed (with horror), to be stupefied (with amazement)
to freeze (from fear, etc.), to be unable to move (e.g. from surprise), to be paralyzed (with horror, etc.)
to cower, to shrink in on oneself
to shrug (shoulders), to duck (head), to draw back (body)
to pin the enemy down, to glare another down (and render impotent)
to hug tight, to grasp firmly, to embrace tightly
to freeze (from fear), to be unable to (too frightened to) run
to cringe with fear, to cower with fright, to be terribly afraid
channeled apple snail (Pomacea canaliculata), golden apple snail
to duck one's head, to pull in one's head, to duck down, to shrug one's shoulders
